html:
9.25.20  10:11 pm   What do you edit on?

      we'll see

9.25.20  9:57 pm   any tips?

      all the tips

9.25.20  9:27 pm   how to crack an egg

      if you take care of it and keep it warm, it will crack itself

9.25.20  9:10 pm   how do i catch a squirrel 

      you'll have to catch an entire tree

9.25.20  8:59 pm   i'm into painting and i always do paintings up until they're almost done but not quite. i'm sitting on top of five or six almost done paintings right now. how can i break this habit?

      have you thought about entering panic mode

9.25.20  8:10 pm   what do you think about people that use capitalization 

      love them

9.25.20  7:58 pm   whenever I analyze a word, it sounds very weird and foreign even though I use it every day. what should I do? 

      that all depends whether you like this feeling of foreignness, or dislike it

9.25.20  7:50 pm   I just wrote a chord sequence to try to practice improvising over, and it's: Fmaj7/G - Gmaj7/A - Fadd9/Bb - Bm7add4 - B9. Does this sound like a good sequence to improv over to you?

     that could sound 1000 different ways. One of the most ambiguous things about the way you wrote it is, you didn't specify the timing. you wrote 5 chords, so, am i to assume it is a 5 bar sequence? probably not, it's more likely that you are putting 2 of those chords in the same bar, but without a more specific explanation there are literally trillions of unknowns, about the way your exercise actually sounds

     Would you suggest writing little sequences like this to practice improv over, or would it be better to just use backing tracks on YouTube?

      what might be even better, is to make sequences based on songs

9.25.20  7:26 pm   Why is my screen glowing?

      so you can see it

9.25.20  7:18 pm   Do your lyrics have a hidden meaning behind them,

     together with the music, the meaning should be laced all through every bit of it

      or is it more of a write as you go kind of thing?

     write first, then go

9.25.20  6:57 pm   why are you so awesome?

      this is to help me blend seamlessly into the fabric of society

9.25.20  6:49 pm   Should i be worried that i watch your videos more then anything else on the internet

      the main thing you should be worried about, is whether or not you should be worried

9.25.20  5:50 pm   Is the next vid gonna come out within the next two months

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

9.25.20  5:45 pm   did you know you're an inspiration?

     we'll see

     bc you are to me :o

9.25.20  5:29 pm   opinion on lemon

      it's like a melon, but different

9.25.20  4:55 pm   HELP MY KEYBOARD IS NOODLE LANGUAGE

      i want to believe you

9.25.20  4:53 pm   what is your opinion on almonds

      the People's Nut

9.25.20  4:48 pm   Do you use a composing or songwriting app like Sibelius? 

      no. i actually thought that was a notation app

9.25.20  4:47 pm   have you ever wrote a dream that came from one of your songs

      yes, that's generally what i try to do when i make videos for songs

9.25.20  4:36 pm   do you think that a monkey hitting keys at random on a typewriter keyboard for an infinite amount of time will almost surely type any given text such as the complete works of william shakespeare?

      no

9.25.20  3:50 pm   is a restaurant a store

      yes

9.25.20  3:46 pm   did you know you wanted to be a musician when you were a child/in school?

      i already was a musician by that point

9.25.20  3:29 pm   am i cool?

      yes but not as cool as your grandparents might have been

9.25.20  3:28 pm   what do you think of heavy metal?

      surprisingly lightweight

9.25.20  3:21 pm   what do you use to make music

      we'll see

9.25.20  2:29 pm   9.24.20 6:17 pm So there's 14,000 levels of suffering now?

      that person was specifically asking about animation

9.25.20  2:17 pm   9.24.20  5:58 pm Bill if you barely had a teacher then how did you manage to get so amazing at music and animation ?

     first let me stop you right there, if i ever get good at animation it certainly hasn't happened yet

     Did you study books for music and animation for learning the theoretical aspect about them?

      it seems the only way to learn that stuff (for real) is by experience. however, from books you might be able to dramatically advance your dinner party conversation tactics. but for me personally i never eat dinner, i just eat lunch twice

9.25.20  2:07 pm   What is your favourite book (if you have a favourite)?

      you'll never guess what's going to happen next, by paige turner

9.25.20  1:49 pm   What is ego?

      making a website dedicated to yourself

9.25.20  1:33 pm   am i a porcupine

      no but you might be the next best thing

9.25.20  1:12 pm   Do you feel empathy for an atom the same way you would a human?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

     If not, what are the boundaries for things you feel empathy for?

     things that are....... mysterious

9.25.20  1:06 pm   i have a job interview soon, what should i do

      go to another job interview before, to practice. if you don't have time, then this next one will have to be the practice one

9.25.20  1:03 pm   is your next song happy or sad or neither or somewhere in between 

      happy

9.25.20  12:45 pm   do you live on the moon silently watching us?

      no

9.25.20  12:35 pm   How can I not be frightened of what has not happened yet?

      find a gentle melodic pattern to sing, repeatedly, a half step higher each time, then jump down an octave when it gets too high

9.25.20  12:34 pm   Bill, how are you so good at deciding when to be serious and when not to be?

      my solution to this is to be serious all the time

9.25.20  12:25 pm   how are machines that make machines made

      by other machines

9.25.20  12:23 pm   do you think you are funny?

      nothing is funny

9.25.20  12:22 pm   I'm going through a weird funk with music right now where I've seemed to develop a legitimate fear of playing my instruments/writing songs/listening to music. I think I slowly shifted my focus to other (often more useless) things and I've become more and more hopelessly overwhelmed at the thought of returning to music. I know baby steps and setting little goals can help, but I get overwhelmed even thinking about those. Do you have any tips on how to get over this?

      it depends on how badly you want to move forward. if your life depends on it, i assure you it can be done. maybe with a few visits from the simplicity police.................

9.25.20  12:17 pm   when will you grow old?

      doing it now

9.25.20  12:16 pm   can you come to my house

      i will come to every house

9.25.20  12:08 pm   anyways, what is music?

      a hypnosis tool, for propaganda enhancement

9.25.20  11:26 am   Why does 'steve' call himself steve even though he is not steve?

      to go for a second plot twist already before the 10 second mark

9.25.20  11:20 am   I feel stuck making similar kinds of music and I'm afraid that it all sounds the same

      try using completely different tools

9.25.20  11:14 am   What is your favorite condiment 

      pepper

9.25.20  11:05 am   I have this thing where my brain just suddenly thinks of lyrics and a tune, but when I try to make a song out of it, I get musician's block and eventually forget the original tune and lyrics.

     gotta write it down immediately

      Is there any way to explain this?

     it's brand new, so you won't remember it properly until you've heard it a few times, but if you don't write it down (i.e. document it in some way, maybe on recording, it doesn't matter) then it will keep morphing, and if you spend any time away from it you will easily forget how it originally went

     If so, is there a way to stop this and actually make a song?

     there are different ways, my way probably takes about 10 years to get the hang of it, so you'll probably want one of the easier ways which i don't know about

     And how do musicians make a good tune and good lyrics?

     i think they all do it different ways

     Thabk you if you answered this Mr. Wurtz.

9.25.20  10:59 am   do u have anxiety?

      FUCKING FUCK NO FUCK DAMMIT NO, FUCK

9.25.20  10:57 am   What motivates you?

      time and space

9.25.20  10:43 am   Why songs?

      i don't know

9.25.20  10:36 am   Are you the touchpad kinda guy or mouse kinda guy?

      keyboard please, unless the action is of an entirely graphical nature
